name: IBM Cloud App Management Agent Installation Template
description: This template will install IBM Cloud App Management agents on a target node.

metadata.displayName: IBM Cloud App Management Agent Installation Template
metadata.longDescription: This template will install IBM Cloud App Management agents on a target node. The Agent Installation package must be loaded in the environment and accessible via a target URI (http/s, artifactory, etc).

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description: Deployed on a single Linux node. Script is executed remotely.

bullets.title: Software Deployed
bullets.description: IBM Cloud Application Performance Management Advanced agent deployment package for Linux

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. IBM Knowledge Center for APM - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSHLNR_8.1.3/com.ibm.pm.doc/welcome.htm
3. This integration template is run remotely on the Target Virtual Machine
4. The APM Agent installation file (APMADV_Agent_Install.tar) must be accessible via a URI.
